item.title: U.S. sanctions 10 people and firms from Iran and Venezuela over drone and missile trade
item.description: The U.S. has imposed sanctions on 10 individuals and firms from Iran and Venezuela. These sanctions target Iranâ€™s drone trade and ballistics program.
